blog.description: Writing and Stuff from Isaac Z. Schlueter
blog.name: izs
blog.title: blog.izs.me

body:
Hello, and welcome to my new and much easier to spell domain name. I previously had isaacschlueter.com, which I plan on keeping, but I’ll probably more-or-less let that domain wither and grow obsolete. I plan to port a lot of my more technical content over to this new sandbox, and post stuff here from now on.

In the meantime, check out what WikiPedia has to say about “foo”.
